entry.content:
Personal Information

  • Name: So Hasegawa
  • Age: 28
  • Mail: crosssceneofwindff |at| gmail.com

Publications and Conferences

  • Facilitating the Identification of the Nannofossil Species in Cretaceous of Abu Dhabi Using Artificial Intelligence H. Tamamura, M. Yamanaka, S. Chiyonobu, G. Yamada, S. Hasegawa, Y. Totake, T. Nanjo In Abu Dhabi International Petroleum Exhibition & Conference, 2020
  • Basics and Application of Generative Adversarial Network S. Hasegawa Invited lecture at Tohoku University, 2019
  • Analysis of light absorption characteristics in very-thin single-crystalline silicon solar cells with photonic crystals S. Hasegawa, K. Ishizaki, Y. Tanaka, and S. Noda In 78th Japan Society of Applied Physics (JSAP) Autumn Meeting, 2017
  • Numerical analysis of μc-Si solar cells with photonic crystals formed on top surface -Introduction of asymmetric structure- S. Hasegawa, K. Ishizaki, Y. Tanaka, A. Motohira, Y. Kawamoto, M. De Zoysa, S. Fujita, and S. Noda In 63th Japan Society of Applied Physics (JSAP) Spring Meeting, 2016

Talks

  • About line art colorization S. Hasegawa 創作＋機械学習LT会, 2019

Education

  • Apr 2016 ~ Mar 2018: MEng in Electronics at Kyoto University
    • My research was focused on Si/u-Si solar cell incorporating photonic crystals. I had designed the structures of solar cells with numerical simulation and heuristic algorithms (e.g. genetics algorithm and machine learning). Also, I manufactured the solar cells based on my design
  • Apr 2012 ~ Mar 2016: BEng in Electrical and Electronic Engineering at Kyoto University

Work Experience

  • Oct 2022 ~ : machine learning researcher at Fujitsu Research of America
    • My research is focused on AutoML
  • Aug 2021 ~ Sep 2022: machine learning researcher at Fujitsu
    • My research was focused on scene graph generation, self-supervised learning, and generative models
  • Apr 2018 ~ Jul 2021: software engineer at Fujitsu
    • I had worked on providing deep learning-based solutions with the customers and developing software products using speech processing and computer vision technologies

Personal Projects

  • Automatic line art colorization
    • Various Implementions of line art colorization with hints and without hints
  • AwesomeAnimeResearch
    • A massive collection of machine learning papers and projects related to anime, illustration and comic
  • KawaiiGenerator
    • Various implementations of deep learning tasks related to anime

Skills

  • Machine Learning and Deep learning
  • Low-level Programming
    • Emulator: NES, GB, CGB (implementations in Go)
    • Clang compiler
  • Programming Language
    • Main: Python, Go
    • Sub: C, Rust, Haskell, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS
  • Software Development
    • Team development
    • OS: Linux(Ubuntu, CentOS), MacOS
    • Container: Docker, Docker-compose, Kubernetes
    • Version management: Git, Gitlab, Github
    • DB: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
    • Others: Nodejs, gRPC, Nginx, RabbitMQ

Interests

  • All the computer science fields
  • Art: I love all kinds of art, especially post-impressionism and art nouveau
